name: Beacon Marine
overview:
Established in the year 1995, Beacon Marine is a leading global recruitment & placement company that provides end to end recruitment solutions to our client’s world wide. The company is approved by the Ministry Of Overseas Indian Affairs, Government Of India operating Under License No. B-0322/Mum/Per/300/4 3/4/8264/2008.

Our Group: Beacon Group Companies include: BEACON MARINE - GLOBAL PLACEMENTS AGENCY. BEACON MARINE PVT. LTD KESHAVA SHIPS

Service Portfolio: Our various services comprise Banking & Financial Sector, Information Technology Sector, Medical Sector, Hospitality Industry and Construction / Infrastructure Industry. We also offer recruitment services in Refineries, Manufacturing Industry, Oil & Gas Industry, Crew Recruitment, Ship Management Services and International Ship Deliveries.

Industries Catered to: Banking & Financial Sector Information Technology Medical Sector Hospitality Industry Construction / Infrastructure Industry Refineries

Domain Expertise: We are a decade old company in the industry and are one of the renowned manpower recruitment service providers in the country. Our methodology and streamlined services have enabled us a vast client base in the world.

Our Team: We are assisted by a team of professionals who are committed towards achieving the organizational goals. Our well trained staff is specialized in identifying and sourcing candidates from various fields and companies. This streamlined process saves time and enables the experts recruit the suitable staff.

Client Satisfaction: We are a client centric organization and have always emphasized on offering prompt services to all our clients. The ethical business policies have helped us in establishing a vast client base across the country. We recruit the eligible candidates for the various posts and jobs and also organize relevant training sessions for them.
